name: better than bean
description:
!!! VERY VERY EARLY DEVELOPMENT !!!

feel free to comment any feedback on the stickied discussion board post!

better than bean is a fun little third person shooter game I started working on after playing Bean Battles with some friends.

the game is being designed with the basics in mind. the goal is to make a game that's easy to pick up, load in, and play a few rounds with friends.
